name: Central Medical Center
description: A modern medical facility with full accessibility features including wheelchair access, sign language interpreters, and visual assistance services.

accessibilityInfo.notes: Sign language interpreters available upon request. Braille signage throughout the facility.

name: Community Health Clinic
description: A community-focused health clinic providing accessible healthcare services to all residents.

accessibilityInfo.notes: Wheelchair accessible entrance and exam rooms available.

name: Accessible Park Entrance
description: A fully accessible park entrance with smooth pathways, accessible restrooms, and audio guides available.

accessibilityInfo.notes: Audio guide system available at the entrance. All pathways are wheelchair accessible.
